page.title: 12Epworth - by a Newcomer.
page.content:
I have only been here in Epworth for four months after being abroad for most of my life.I didn't expect Epworth would be this nice.I like the people here and I have already made lots of friends.Although it is a big village,everyone seems to know everyone else. I think it is a well laid out village and there are many historic buildings to see.There is a new leisure centre here but it doesn't have a swimming pool.This is one thing which I would like to see built in the future.
By Vikki Odell
